## Description

The **Zip** component helps with handling and manipulating `.zip` files.

## Actions

<div id="compressgzip" />

### Compress Gzip

Compress Gzip file | <small><b>key: compressGzip</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "File to Gzip compress",
      key: "file",
      type: "data",
      default: "",
      label: "File Data",
    },
  ]}
/>

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="decompressgzip" />

### Decompress Gzip

Decompress Gzip file | <small><b>key: decompressGzip</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Gzip data to decompress",
      key: "file",
      type: "data",
      default: "",
      label: "Gzip File Data",
    },
  ]}
/>

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="unzip" />

### Unzip

Decompress a Zip file | <small><b>key: unzip</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments: "Zip data to decompress",
      key: "file",
      type: "data",
      default: "",
      label: "Zip File Data",
    },
  ]}
/>

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": [
    {
      "name": "filename.txt",
      "data": {
        "data": {
          "type": "Buffer",
          "data": [
            104,
            101,
            108,
            108,
            111
          ]
        },
        "contentType": "text/plain"
      },
      "path": "path/"
    }
  ]
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />

<div id="zip" />

### Zip

Compress a Zip file | <small><b>key: zip</b></small>

<ComponentInputsTable
  inputs={[
    {
      required: true,
      comments:
        "Files to include in the Zip; should be an object with filename keys and values containing file contents",
      key: "files",
      type: "data",
      default: "",
      label: "Files",
    },
  ]}
/>

[Collection Tools](../collection-tools) has useful utilities for building up data to provide to the Zip action.

#### Output Example Payload

```
{
  "data": {
    "type": "Buffer",
    "data": [
      104,
      101,
      108,
      108,
      111
    ]
  },
  "contentType": "application/zip"
}
```

<hr className="componentActionSeparator" />
